meanings.sent1: The building blocks were cubiform, making it easy to stack them up.
meanings.sent2: The dice in the game were cubiform, each side showing a different number.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to make a cubiform cake, but it turned out looking more like a pyramid!
meanings.sent4: His head felt cubiform with all the math problems swirling around in it.
meanings.sent5: The cubiform ice cubes clinked in the glass as he poured the drink.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a cube.
meanings.sent1: The gift box was cubiform, hinting at its contents.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with cubiform furniture, giving it a modern look.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cubiform box to play in, thinking it was a new hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were cubiform, neatly organized and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The cubiform pattern on the rug added a touch of symmetry to the room.
